question: What was the theme for the International Mother Language Day that was observed across the world on 21 February 2017?
option1: Inclusive Education through and with Language - Language Matters
option2: Quality education, language(s) of instruction and learning outcomes
option3: Towards Sustainable Futures through Multilingual Education
option4: Local languages for Global Citizenship: Spotlight on Science
answer: Towards Sustainable Futures through Multilingual Education
